data.title: Mayor Frosh – Biography, Age, Networth, Relationship
data.meta_description: Mayor Frosh, whose real name is Mayowa Adewumi, is a well-known Nigerian comedian and content creator. He's one of Nigeria’s most entertaining online
data.text:
Mayor Frosh, whose real name is Mayowa Adewumi, is a well-known Nigerian comedian and content creator.

He’s one of Nigeria’s most entertaining online personalities and a contestant on Big Brother Naija’s “No LooseGuard” season.

In this article, we delve into his biography, education, age, and his journey to the Big Brother Naija house.

Profile Summary

Real Name: Mayowa Adewumi

Nickname: Mayor Frosh, Mr. Rizz

Age: 24 years

Date of Birth: September 20, 1999

State of Origin: Oyo State

Nationality: Nigerian

Tribe: Yoruba

Height: 6 ft

Complexion: Dark skin

Eye Color: Dark Brown

Net Worth: Approximately 5 million naira

Related Personalities: Shaun Okojie, Nelly, Victoria Onyenwere

Instagram: @mayor_frosh

Biography

Mayowa Adewumi, known as Mayor Frosh, was born on September 20, 1999, making him 24 years old as of July 2024. He has spent most of his life in Lagos, creating content in various locations across the city.

Education

Mayor graduated from Caleb University in Imota, Lagos State, with a Bachelor’s degree in Mass Communication from the Faculty of Arts.

Big Brother Naija Journey

In July 2024, Mayor joined Big Brother Naija as a contestant, competing for the 100 million naira prize in the show’s ninth edition. His teammate, Toby Forge, is a 27-year-old content creator and dance artist from Oyo State.

Career as a Skit Maker

Mayor started his journey in content creation as a hobby in 2016, after finishing secondary school. Initially part of the group Future Generation Comedy (FGC), he eventually focused on his solo career as a comedian and content creator. He has produced over 400 Instagram skits, beloved by thousands of fans across Nigeria. His most popular content involves “rizz” skits, where he approaches women with corny pick-up lines.

Social Media

Known as Mr. Rizz on social media, Mayor collaborates with other top skit makers, influencers, and content creators like Hauwa, Onion Cider, Mynameiboss, and Jayonair. He has 140k followers and millions of likes on his Instagram page, @mayor_frosh.

Relationship

Mayor Frosh is currently single and does not have a girlfriend.
